name: 2nights
description:
PALOFGU, 2021
(2 months without freedom. 2 months without retreat. 2nights to let everything out)

With a focus on acrylic painting, “Away from home” conveys the spirit of a young man embarking on his own journey to explore new surroundings. The series of artworks presents various moods, such as wanderlust, depression or bliss, intending to create art that leaves room for the audience to think about their own life changing moments. After a couple of losses and challenges in my past, I set myself to achieve a goal to create something of a unique and personalized expression to portray the impressions and impacts that had been imprinted onto me, throughout these adventures of mine.

Please visit www.pinktank.art for more information.
